name: penguin-history
description: Procedural world history generation and visualization

scripts.sync: cp world-gen/output/*.json world-explorer/src/data/ && echo 'âœ… World data synced to visualization'
scripts.generate:sync: npm run generate && npm run sync
scripts.generate:sync:partial: LLM_ENABLED=partial npm run generate && npm run sync
scripts.generate:sync:full: LLM_ENABLED=full npm run generate && npm run sync
scripts.dev: npm run generate:sync && npm run viz
scripts.install:all: cd world-gen && npm install && cd ../world-explorer && npm install
scripts.clean:all: cd world-gen && npm run clean && cd ../world-explorer && rm -rf dist
